column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Fwoo , I 'm getting really hungry .
#Text=Besides , look at this fruit , it 's disgusting .
#Text=We do n't want to steal this .
#Text=" Tu says : " Hey , you trying to steal my fruit ?
#Text=" Mako says : " No , I just said I do n't want any of this rotten fruit .
#Text=" Tu says : " Oh , you 're too good for my fruit ?
#Text=This is the best fruit on the block .
#Text=" Mako says : " So you want me to steal it ?
#Text=" Tu says : " Just try me , buddy .
#Text=Go ahead .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I 'm confused .
#Text=Are we stealing the fruit or not ?
#Text=" Tu says : " I knew it .
#Text=Thieves !
#Text=" Chow says : " What 's going on here ?
#Text=" Tu says : " Dad , these fruit thieves are insulting our fruit .
#Text=" Chow says : " Bolin ?
#Text=Mako ?
#Text=" Mako says : " How do you know our names ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah , I mean I 'm famous so I get that , but how do you know his name ?
#Text=" Chow says : " You look just like San .
#Text=Tu , you 'll never believe who these guys are .
#Text=They 're your cousins !
#Text=My brother San 's kids .
#Text="
